title: LolClient.exe has stopped working
body:
Screenshot of how it looks^^. Every time I log onto my account this show up for like 5 times in a row.
I have W10 and all drivers up to date I dont know what could be the problem.{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
If you installed the recent Windows 10 anniversary updates, they could be the root of the problem. I recommend [rolling back or uninstalling](http://www.howtogeek.com/235474/how-to-roll-back-builds-and-uninstall-updates-on-windows-10/) any recent updates from the last week to see if it causes any change.

Let me know if this helped.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ONPAL05u,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-08T23:40:11.665+0000)
>
> If you installed the recent Windows 10 anniversary updates, they could be the root of the problem. I recommend [rolling back or uninstalling](http://www.howtogeek.com/235474/how-to-roll-back-builds-and-uninstall-updates-on-windows-10/) any recent updates from the last week to see if it causes any change.
> 
> Let me know if this helped.

It seems to work by uninstalling one of the updates, but I dont have an option to go back to an earlier build and idk if the update I uninstalled was important lol.
Which update did you uninstall? or all the recent ones from the new forceupdate
I get the exact same error i think it might be with the new windows update? i am not sure though.
